column4: Work or volunteer setting outside the home.
column5: In the last 7 days, which best describes the primary location/setting where you worked or volunteered outside your home? Select only one answer.

column4:
1) Hospital
2) Nursing and residential healthcare facility
3) Pharmacy
4) Ambulatory healthcare (e.g. doctor, dentist or mental health specialist office, outpatient facility, medical and diagnostic laboratory, home health care) 
5) Social service (e.g., child, youth, family, elderly, disability services) 
6) Preschool or daycare 
7) K-12 school 
8) Other schools and instructional settings (e.g. college, university, professional, business, technical or trade school, driving school, test preparation, tutoring) 
9) First response (e.g., police or fire protection, emergency relief services) 
10)Death care (e.g., funeral home, crematory, cemetery) 
11) Correctional facility (e.g., jail, prison, detention center, reformatory) 
12) Food and beverage store (e.g., grocery store, warehouse club, supercenters, convenience store, specialty food store, bakery) 
13) Agriculture, forestry, fishing, or hunting 
14) Food manufacturing facility (e.g., meat-processing, produce packing, food or beverage manufacturing) 
15) Non-food manufacturing facility (e.g. metals, equipment and machinery, electronics) 
16) Public transit (e.g., bus, commuter rail, subway, school bus) 
17) United States Postal Service 
18) Other job deemed “essential” during the COVID-19 pandemic 
19) None of the above 
-99) Question seen but category not selected
-88) Missing / Did not report
column7: Question lead changed to 'Last 7 days' and response categories for health care expanded for 3.2
